allegations.description: 01.Failed to activate their body worn camera.
02.Failed to make required entries in Department Logs.

allegations.penalty: B - COMMAND DISCIPLINE, VACATION DAYS (5 day(s) )

allegations.description: 02.Wrongfully discourteous to an individual known to the Department.

charges.description: WRONGFULLY ALLOWED HIS RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS TO BE USED BY ANOTHER AS HIS RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS, THEREBY CAUSING INACCURATE ENTRIES IN DEPARTMENT RECORDS.
